verses.text: When I would have \w healed|strong="H7495"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, then the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* was \w discovered|strong="H1540"\w*, and the \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*: for they \w commit|strong="H6466"\w* \w falsehood|strong="H8267"\w*; and the \w thief|strong="H1590"\w* cometh \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, \add and\add* the \w troop|strong="H1416"\w* of robbers \w spoileth|strong="H6584"\w* \w without|strong="H2351"\w*.\f + \fr 7.1 \ft wickedness: Heb. evils\f*\f + \fr 7.1 \ft spoileth: Heb. strippeth\f*

And they \w consider|strong="H0559"\w* not in their \w hearts|strong="H3824"\w* \add that\add* I \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* all their \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w*: now their own \w doings|strong="H4611"\w* have beset them \w about|strong="H5437"\w*; they are before my \w face|strong="H6440"\w*.\f + \fr 7.2 \ft consider…: Heb. say not to\f*
They make the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w glad|strong="H8055"\w* with their \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w*, and the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* with their \w lies|strong="H3585"\w*.

They \add are\add* all \w adulterers|strong="H5003"\w*, as an \w oven|strong="H8574"\w* \w heated|strong="H1197"\w* by the \w baker|strong="H0644"\w*, \add who\add* \w ceaseth|strong="H7673"\w* from \w raising|strong="H5782"\w* after he hath \w kneaded|strong="H3888"\w* the \w dough|strong="H1217"\w*, until it be \w leavened|strong="H2556"\w*.\f + \fr 7.4 \ft who…: or, the raiser will cease\f*\f + \fr 7.4 \ft raising: or, waking\f*

In the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of our \w king|strong="H4428"\w* the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* have made \add him\add* \w sick|strong="H2470"\w* with \w bottles|strong="H2534"\w* of \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*; he stretched \w out|strong="H4900"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* with \w scorners|strong="H3945"\w*.\f + \fr 7.5 \ft bottles…: or, heat through wine\f*

For they have made \w ready|strong="H7126"\w* their \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* like an \w oven|strong="H8574"\w*, whiles they lie in \w wait|strong="H0693"\w*: their \w baker|strong="H0644"\w* \w sleepeth|strong="H3463"\w* all the \w night|strong="H3915"\w*; in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* it \w burneth|strong="H1197"\w* as a \w flaming|strong="H3852"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.\f + \fr 7.6 \ft made…: or, applied\f*

They are all \w hot|strong="H2552"\w* as an \w oven|strong="H8574"\w*, and have \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w* their \w judges|strong="H8199"\w*; all their \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* are \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w*: \add there is\add* none among them that \w calleth|strong="H7121"\w* unto me.

\w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, he hath \w mixed|strong="H1101"\w* himself among the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* is a \w cake|strong="H5692"\w* not \w turned|strong="H2015"\w*.

\w Strangers|strong="H2114"\w* have \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w* his \w strength|strong="H3581"\w*, and he \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* \add it\add* not: yea, gray \w hairs|strong="H7872"\w* are here and \w there|strong="H2236"\w* upon him, yet he \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* not.\f + \fr 7.9 \ft here…: Heb. sprinkled\f*

And the \w pride|strong="H1347"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w testifieth|strong="H6030"\w* to his \w face|strong="H6440"\w*: and they do not \w return|strong="H7725"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, nor \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* him for all this.

¶ \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* also is like a \w silly|strong="H6601"\w* \w dove|strong="H3123"\w* without \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*: they \w call|strong="H7121"\w* to \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, they \w go|strong="H1980"\w* to \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*.

When they shall \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, I will \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* my \w net|strong="H7568"\w* upon them; I will bring them \w down|strong="H3381"\w* as the \w fowls|strong="H5775"\w* of the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*; I will \w chastise|strong="H3256"\w* them, as their \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* hath \w heard|strong="H8088"\w*.

\w Woe|strong="H0188"\w* unto them! for they have \w fled|strong="H5074"\w* from me: \w destruction|strong="H7701"\w* unto them! because they have \w transgressed|strong="H6586"\w* against me: though I have \w redeemed|strong="H6299"\w* them, yet they have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w lies|strong="H3577"\w* against me.\f + \fr 7.13 \ft destruction: Heb. spoil\f*

And they have not \w cried|strong="H2199"\w* unto me with their \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, when they \w howled|strong="H3213"\w* upon their \w beds|strong="H4904"\w*: they \w assemble|strong="H1481"\w* themselves for \w corn|strong="H1715"\w* and \w wine|strong="H8492"\w*, \add and\add* they \w rebel|strong="H5493"\w* against me.

Though I have \w bound|strong="H3256"\w* \add and\add* \w strengthened|strong="H2388"\w* their \w arms|strong="H2220"\w*, yet do they \w imagine|strong="H2803"\w* \w mischief|strong="H7451"\w* against me.\f + \fr 7.15 \ft have…: or, chastened\f*

They \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, \add but\add* not to the most \w High|strong="H5920"\w*: they are like a \w deceitful|strong="H7423"\w* \w bow|strong="H7198"\w*: their \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* for the \w rage|strong="H2195"\w* of their \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*: \w this|strong="H2097"\w* \add shall be\add* their \w derision|strong="H3933"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.
